snippet: In an exclusive interview, President Obama says the deal is “the most definitive path by which Iran will not get a nuclear weapon.”
abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column expresses lingering doubts over whether Iran nuclear agreement is best possible deal to prevent country from acquiring nuclear weapons, but acknowledges Pres Obama has made very cogent argument supporting deal's merits.
